text:
All sorts of #COVIDShame in #Africa!
If you are infected, you are shamed. If you wear mask, you are shamed.
If you take #vaccine, you are shamed.
If you are admitted, you are shamed.
It appears the only way to not be shamed is to die of #COVID19!!😕 What's wrong with us? https://t.co/sgABYkDsRO
